entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
